VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_pengadaan` AS select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`pt` AS `pt`,`aa`.`merk_barang` AS `merk_barang`,`aa`.`jml_barang` AS `jml_barang`,`aa`.`satuan` AS `satuan`,`aa`.`harga` AS `harga`,`aa`.`jml_harga` AS `jml_harga`,`aa`.`a1` AS `a1`,`aa`.`a` AS `a`,`aa`.`b` AS `b`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`e1` AS `e1`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`l` AS `l`,`aa`.`m` AS `m`,`aa`.`n` AS `n`,`aa`.`o` AS `o`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`aa`.`nip_pejabat_pengadaan` AS `nip_pejabat_pengadaan`,`aa`.`nama_pejabat_pengadaan` AS `nama_pejabat_pengadaan`,`aa`.`nip_pembuat_komitmen` AS `nip_pembuat_komitmen`,`aa`.`nama_pembuat_komitmen` AS `nama_pembuat_komitmen`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`aa`.`uid` AS `uid`,`bb`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang`,`aa`.`ref_iddkb` AS `ref_iddkb`,`aa`.`kf` AS `kf`,`aa`.`k` AS `k`,`ref_jurnal`.`nm_account` AS `nm_account`,`aa`.`thn_akun` AS `thn_akun`,`aa`.`ref_idsk` AS `ref_idsk`,`pengadaan_sk`.`spk_tgl` AS `spk_tgl`,`pengadaan_sk`.`spk_no` AS `spk_no`,`pengadaan_sk`.`dpa_tgl` AS `dpa_tgl`,`pengadaan_sk`.`dpa_no` AS `dpa_no`,`pengadaan_sk`.`p` AS `p`,`pengadaan_sk`.`q` AS `q`,`pengadaan_sk`.`nama_pekerjaan` AS `nama_pekerjaan`,`pengadaan_sk`.`nama_perusahaan` AS `nama_perusahaan`,`pengadaan_sk`.`alamat` AS `alamat` from (((`pengadaan` `aa` left join `ref_barang` `bb` on(((`aa`.`f` = `bb`.`f`) and (`aa`.`g` = `bb`.`g`) and (`aa`.`h` = `bb`.`h`) and (`aa`.`i` = `bb`.`i`) and (`aa`.`j` = `bb`.`j`)))) left join `ref_jurnal` on(((`aa`.`k` = `ref_jurnal`.`ka`) and (`aa`.`l` = `ref_jurnal`.`kb`) and (`aa`.`m` = `ref_jurnal`.`kc`) and (`aa`.`n` = `ref_jurnal`.`kd`) and (`aa`.`o` = `ref_jurnal`.`ke`) and (`aa`.`kf` = `ref_jurnal`.`kf`) and (`aa`.`thn_akun` = `ref_jurnal`.`thn_akun`)))) left join `pengadaan_sk` on((`aa`.`ref_idsk` = `pengadaan_sk`.`id`)))
